## data prep
```{r}
# load packages
library(igraph)

# custom functions

# read in data seperately
```

```{r}
# for the next steps, we need to move title to the last column
edge1 <- edgelist %>%
  filter(condition == 'visible') %>%
  select(sender, receiver, subject)
```
